mention.text: a just trial of them , but also a means to eloquently express the rejection of the entire society , which calls itself christian , against such a cruel and unjust crime that reveals absolute contempt for human life , '' a communique signed by archbishop mcgrath states

a means to eloquently express the rejection of the entire society , which calls itself christian , against such a cruel and unjust crime that reveals absolute contempt for human life , '' a communique signed by archbishop mcgrath states
spanish bishop jose luis lacunza , secretary of panama 's episcopal conference and rector of santa maria la antigua university
adames , who is also rector of panama 's national university
